name: Adventure Apes and the Mayan Mystery
description: Go Ape-bit with this fast-paced retro platformer, in which you work to recover a stolen magical artifact in the labyrinth of an ancient temple!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Processor: Intel Quad CPU Q8300 2.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350 Storage: 25 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Adventure apes works fine as a lite metroidvania but the platforming is arguably a bit awkward. Fortunately the game does not ask for much when it comes to platforming; most of the game is instead spent fighting monsters using the array of weapons found in the game.   Recommended to: Metroidvania lovers, those who can handle slightly imprecise controls in their platformers   Detailed information below:    Gameplay
